card.description: You are swarmed by angry bees. You must run about frantically for the duration.
card.acting: Shout in terror and run out the nearest exit, screaming about bees.

card.title: Stoned Out of Your Gourd
card.description: You have been turned to stone. You may not act for the duration, nor may you speak.
card.acting: Sit as still as possible without speaking for the duration.

card.title: Slow Motion
card.description: You feel incredibly sluggish. Your movement speed is halved (round down), and any bonus actions count as full actions.
card.acting: Talk to your party very slowly.

card.title: Two Heads Are Not Better
card.description: You have sprouted a second head. It will disagree with you and contradict your every thought. Change your mind on every decision.

card.title: Which End Goes in the Enemy?
card.description: Do not add your proficiency bonus to any rolls.
card.acting: Act exceptionally clumsy.

card.title: Master of the Universe
card.description: Everyone is your servant. Have them do what you don’t feel like doing. If they resist, ask them why you pay them at all.

card.title: I’ll Bite Yer Kneecaps Off!
card.description: You feel rather inferior to your other companions. Always pick a fight with the biggest enemy to prove yourself.

card.title: Ritual Madness
card.description: You’ve suddenly developed a rather strange habit. Every time you roll a die, do something strange. You must do the same action every time you roll.
card.acting: Sneeze loudly. Point at each die rolled 3 times. Scratch a body part in exactly the same place 5 times, counting loudly. Count up to, or down from, the number rolled. Check for your wallet.

description.line: Sometimes you like to think things through. Other times… not so much.
Act Lawful for 1d10 minutes, then act Chaotic for 1d10 minutes. Repeat for one session.

card.title: Three-Ring Circus!
card.description: You’re the lead actor of a circus! Proclaim everything you’re about to do, as if you’re a ringmaster at a circus.

card.title: Goodnight!
card.description: You fall unconscious for the duration. No amount of jostling or damage can wake you.

card.title: Safety at the Bottom of a Bottle
card.description: Your character drinks excessively.
card.acting: Act drunk out-of-game.

card.title: Five-Finger Discount
card.description: If you pick something up, do not give it to your companions. Take any loot that drops.
card.acting: Try and take random items from your friends. Give them back at the end of the session if it is not noticed.

card.title: Little Sibling Syndrome
card.description: Pick a character in the party. Your character must act like them.
card.acting: Behave like the player who belongs to that character.

card.title: I’m Only Interesting If I Tell Tall Tales
card.description: Bend the truth, exaggerate, or lie about everything.Exaggerate everything at the table, tell tall tales.

card.title: My Goal Is All That Matters
card.description: Endlessly pursue your personal goals regardless of anything else going on, or your party’s desires. This may require going alone.

card.title: Who Cares?
card.description: Don’t act interested in anything going on around you.

card.title: My Dad Owns A Dealership!
card.description: Everyone is silently judging your actions. Accuse them of it!

card.title: “I am so beautiful … to me! Can’t you see?”
card.description: You’re the smartest, strongest, fastest, and most beautiful person you’ve ever known.

card.title: They’re Everywhere, and They’re Coming for Me!
card.description: There are foes chasing you everywhere you go, and they are watching you.

card.title: Just keep swimming, just keep swimming…
card.description: You are compelled to repeat a specific activity over and over.
card.acting: Repeat a task out-of-game.

card.title: Look! A Flying Monkey!
card.description: You experience vivid hallucinations for the duration, and have disadvantage on ability checks.
card.acting: Point out strange sightings to your companions.

card.title: Jet Fuel Can’t Melt Steel Beams
card.description: You suffer extreme paranoia, and have disadvantage on Wisdom and Charisma checks.

card.title: Disgusting! Keep That Away!
card.description: You find something (of your choice, usually the source of your madness) incredibly revolting, as if affected by the Antipathy spell.

card.title: My skin is made of stone! My flesh rapidly heals! I am unstoppable!
card.description: You experience a powerful delusion. Ask your DM for a potion name (Discreetly!). You must act as if you are under the effects of that potion.

card.title: My, This Must Be Lucky!
card.description: You become attached to a non-combat item of your choice. You suffer disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws when over 30' away from it.
card.acting: Bring an item everywhere with you.

card.title: I Can’t Hear! I Can’t See! (I want to be a referee!)
card.description: Roll a d4. On a 1, you are blinded. Any other roll, you are deafened.
card.acting: If you are blinded, close your eyes and play blind! If you are deafened, don’t listen to anyone other than the DM.

card.title: “A Boy’s Best Friend Is His Mother”
card.description: You suffer uncontrollable tremors or tics, which pose disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws that involve Strength or Dexterity.
card.acting: Twitch randomly out-of-game.

card.title: Who are you? Who, who? Who, who?
card.description: You suffer from partial amnesia. You know who you are and retain racial traits and class features, but you don’t recognize other people or events prior to your madness.
card.acting: Act like you do not know your friends.

card.title: The Trouble With Mr. Bean
card.description: You cannot speak.
card.acting: Resort to exaggerated facial expressions and frustrated signs to get points across.

description.line: There’s only one person I can trust, and only I can see them.
You have an imaginary friend! Communicate with them regularly and ask for their advice and opinion.

card.title: This Is Hilarious!
card.description: You find it difficult to take anything seriously. The more serious the situation, the funnier it is.

card.title: “Oh my God, it even has a watermark …”

description.line: Viciously mutilate your foes and their bodies. Attempt to kill your allies.

card.title: Oh. I’m Dead
card.description: Act like a ghost. Try to pass through walls and scare people.

card.title: You’re the Star!
card.description: Sing anything you say.

card.title: The Floor Is Lava
card.description: Your character must attempt to avoid the ground, or hop up and down frantically.
card.acting: Don’t touch the floor! (Unless you need to use the restroom. DM’s option to award an Inspiration Point if you manage to make it to the restroom without touching the floor.)

card.title: Cut It Out! Mmmmmmmoooommmmmm!
card.description: Mimic everything the person to your left does. Your character must do the same. If you are doing something else, you may ignore this rule for that period, but your character may not.
You must audibly breathe, taking deep breaths and deep exhales.

card.title: Is It Safe to Do That?
card.description: You must ask the DM for permission to do anything for the duration.
You must shout a random word that you think of every 10 minutes. Lasts one session.

card.title: Drove downtown in the rain / 9:30 on a Tuesday Night
card.description: The outside world isn’t safe! Retreat within your mind for safety. You are paralyzed for the duration.
card.acting: Do not move for the duration.

card.title: That’s Hilarious!
card.description: You must keep laughing (At least when acknowledged) for the duration. During this time you are incapacitated.

card.title: Zoiks!

description.line: You’re terrified of demons. And spiders. And people. And that rock over there.
You are Frightened for the duration.

card.acting: Jump in fear (Maybe shout too!) if someone acknowledges you.

description.line: What language did you speak? You’ve forgotten. Time to make a new language.
You are incapable of normal speech (and thus spellcasting) for the duration, and only babble incoherently.

card.title: Enemies Are All Around! It’s Not Safe!
card.description: Attack the nearest creature, friend or foe (choose randomly if more than one creature qualifies) each round for the duration.
card.acting: Pretend your friends are monsters or evil villains.

card.title: Look! A Flying Monkey!
card.description: You experience vivid hallucinations for the duration, and have disadvantage on ability checks.
card.acting: Point out strange sightings to your companions.

card.title: Everybody’s Ideas Sound Like Good Ideas. What Could Go Wrong?
card.description: You will do whatever anyone tells you that isn’t obviously self- destructive for the duration.
card.acting: Do what you are told out-of-game as well, as long as it’s not harmful.

card.title: That Looks Rather Tasty…
card.description: You want to eat something strange, such as dirt or slime for the duration.
card.acting: Ask the player next to you if you can eat their pencil, or dice, or character sheet.

card.title: Goodnight!
card.description: You fall unconscious for the duration.
card.acting: Slump over on the table unresponsive.

card.title: You Know the One. It Sounds Like Truncheons & Flagons

description.line: We are just pawns in a game of giants! They leave our fates up to the dice! Look above you! Do you not see them?
You are convinced that this is just a tabletop game played by giant people.
